text:
He started to see those seven years as if they were just seven days. He didn't realize that this new life wouldn't come easy; he would have to work hard for it and suffer a lot. 

But that's the start of a new storyâ€”the story of how a man slowly changes, how he moves from one world to another, and how he begins a new, unknown life. That could be the topic of a new story, but our current story is over.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The page concludes with the idea that the protagonist's journey towards renewal and regeneration marks the beginning of a new story, while the current narrative has come to an end.
